physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ptosis of the left upper eyelid; unable to elevate left eyelid; visual acuity 20/40 (left), 20/30 (right); intact extraocular movements with nystagmus on leftward gaze; 2+ bilateral pedal edema; resting tremor of hands; past pointing on finger-nose-finger testing.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient initially reported feeling unsteady; on reexamination, unable to walk without assistance, wide-based gait observed.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Blood pressure 124/74 mm Hg; oxygen saturation 92 to 98%
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Ptosis of left eyelid; mild intention tremor; strong gag reflex; 1+ deep-tendon reflexes; flexor plantar reflexes; otherwise normal examination.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature 37.8°C; blood pressure 147/74 mm Hg; pulse 72 bpm; respiratory rate 18 breaths per minute; oxygen saturation 96% on oxygen (4 liters); fell to 83% on ambient air.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Neck supple; decreased muscle tone; unable to extend neck against gravity; jugular venous pressure elevated; heavy secretions in oropharynx; diffuse coarse rhonchi; reflexes 2+ and symmetric.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient reported coughing and choking on food; difficulty breathing noted.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Temperature 36.1°C; other vital signs normal (pulse, blood pressure, respiratory rate unspecified).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient appeared frail; wearing a cervical collar.
